title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat charitable remainder pet trusts in a manner similar to charitable remainder annuity trusts.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the tax treatment of a charitable remainder pet trust as a charitable remainder annuity trust. Defines charitable remainder pet trust as a trust which pays a specified annual amount for the care of domesticated companion animals living at the time of creation of the trust.
